contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} '''USS ''South Dakota''''' may refer to: * {{USS|South Dakota|ACR-9}}, was a [[Pennsylvania-class cruiser|''Pennsylvania''-class armored cruiser]] that escorted troops and convoys during World War I * {{USS|South Dakota|BB-49}}, was planned as the lead ship of [[South Dakota-class battleship (1920)|her class]] of battleship, but canceled before launch * {{USS|South Dakota|BB-57}}, was the lead ship of [[South Dakota-class battleship (1939)|her class]] of battleship, and saw action during World War II * {{USS|South Dakota|SSN-790}} is a planned {{sclass-|Virginia|submarine}} {{Shipindex}} ==See also== * [[South Dakota (disambiguation)]] * [[South Dakota class]] {{DEFAULTSORT:South Dakota}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]] [[Category:United States Navy South Dakota-related ships]]
